translation.en: - [crash] - Sorry, guys! I'm still getting used to driving inside a mansion.
translation.ko: 미안, 저택 안 운전은 익숙하지 않아

translation.en: And driving.
Are you guys okay?
I'm good. The airbag broke my fall.
Darcy, the wagon doesn't have an airbag.
I meant Murray.
After that collision, I need to make an appointment with my chiropractor...
and my attorney.
Could have sworn my bedroom was around here somewhere.
Let's ask her for directions.
That's Irona, my maid.
Wow. You are really hot.
My electrostatic super capacitor tends to overheat.
translation.ko: 내 정전기 슈퍼 축전기가 과열될 때가 있어요

translation.en: Guess I should have mentioned she's also a robot.
I splurged on the supermodel model.
I've never uttered these words in my life,
translation.ko: 평생 이런 말 해본 적 없지만

translation.en: but money well spent.
This is Murray, my best friend and money manager.
translation.ko: 얘는 머리야 내 절친이자 재정 관리인

translation.en: And this is Darcy, my other best friend. Don't let her see my bank password.
translation.ko: 얘는 다르시, 역시 절친 내 계좌 비번 못 보게 해

translation.en: We'll talk later.
Welcome to Richie's bedroom.
Wow! This place is awesome!
I can't believe you live here now. I can't believe you paid for all of this!
translation.ko: - 여기 살다니 못 믿겠어 - 돈 주고 샀다니 못 믿겠어

translation.en: Check it out.
It's got a dollar comforter. You mean down?
No, I mean it's filled with dollars.
Master Richie's entire room is automated
and can be controlled by a push of a button on his room remote.
translation.ko: 리모컨으로 모든 걸 작동할 수 있어요

translation.en: Or roomote. Chuckle. Chuckle.
Is that an aquarium? Yep! Meet my new pet whales:
Dollar, Dollar, and Bill, y'all!
All you need is a bubbling treasure chest.
translation.ko: 거품 나오는 보물 상자만 있으면 되겠네

translation.en: Over there.
Is that real gold? And on a completely unrelated note, do you have a snorkel?
translation.ko: 진짜 금이야? 근데 혹시 스노클 있어?

translation.en: My name is Richie Rich, and I'm just a normal kid...
translation.ko: 내 이름은 리치 리치 평범한 아이죠

translation.en: except that I have a trillion dollars.
You see, I used all the vegetables I never ate to create a new energy source
translation.ko: 제가 절대 안 먹는 채소로 새 에너지원을 만들어

translation.en: - and sold it for a lot of money. - [cha-ching]
Now I live in a huge mansion
with my own amusement park, race car,
translation.ko: 이제 놀이공원이 있는 저택에 살아요 경주용 차와 개인 로봇 하녀와 함께요

translation.en: and personal robot maid.
translation.ko: 경주용 차와 개인 로봇 하녀와 함께요 제 가족, 절친들과 재산을 함께 누려야죠

translation.en: And I have my family and the best friends in the world to share my fortune with.
translation.ko: 제 가족, 절친들과 재산을 함께 누려야죠

translation.en: My dad, my jealous sister Harper,
my money manager Murray, and my money spender Darcy.
translation.ko: 재정 관리인인 머리 내 돈 잘 쓰는 다르시

translation.en: I guess you could say by not eating my vegetables,
I became the richest and luckiest kid in the world!
translation.ko: 세상에서 가장 부자에 운 좋은 아이가 됐어요

translation.en: Gold bar?
I wanted a candy bar! Stupid machine...
translation.ko: 난 초콜릿바를 원했는데 바보 같은 기계

translation.en: Richie, I feel like you're throwing money away.
translation.ko: 리치, 넌 돈을 막 버리는 것 같아

translation.en: Did get this basketball for free.
That's great! When I bought a professional basketball team. Ugh!
I'm glad we still hang out, even though you're rich now.
translation.ko: 네가 부자가 됐는데도 우리랑 놀아서 다행이야

translation.en: Of course! We're best friends. Now, check this out!
Air ball!
No more air balls for me!
My engineers invented this never-miss basketball hoop...
after seeing my jump shot...
Sick!
If you think that's cool, you should see the bathrooms.
translation.ko: 그게 멋진 거 같으면 내 화장실을 봐

translation.en: They were able to use the same technology on the toilets!
Master Richie, I just received a message from your father.
[father's voice] "Richie, please come into the living room."
translation.ko: 리치 님, 아버님에게서 메시지 왔어요 '리치, 거실로 와라'

translation.en: Irona, I know you have the voice modulation software,
translation.ko: 아이로나, 음성 변조 소프트웨어 있는 거 알아

translation.en: but please don't speak in my dad's voice. Totally ruins the magic.
translation.ko: 근데 아빠 목소리 내지 마 기분 망친다고

translation.en: Uh, ha-ha... Dad? This isn't our old house.
You don't have to sleep in the living room or shower in the neighbor's sprinklers.
translation.ko: 거실에서 자거나 이웃집 잔디 물 줄 때 샤워 안 해도 돼요

translation.en: Richie, I'm a man who doesn't require luxuries like beds or indoor plumbing.
translation.ko: 난 침대나 실내 수돗물 같은 사치 필요 없어

translation.en: I can be happy on a couch.
I have to be, since I can't figure out how to get in my bedroom with that high-tech entry system.
translation.ko: 행복해야 해, 최신 시스템 때문에 내 방에 못 들어가

translation.en: It's just a doorknob.
And what's that crazy-looking eye scanner device?
A peephole?
Richie.
My room looks exactly like the Harvard library.
And while I might appreciate having a full-time librarian,
I wish she wouldn't shush me every time I speak.
I am not even in my room!
Harper, I knew how hard you've been working to get in Harvard
translation.ko: 누나, 하버드 가려고 노력해온 거 알아

translation.en: so I thought if I made your dream come true, it'd make you happy!
translation.ko: 그 꿈을 이뤄주면 행복해할 줄 알았어

translation.en: You don't seem happy.
I want to get into the actual Harvard, not a replica my slacker brother built.
translation.ko: 난 진짜 하버드에 가고 싶어 게으른 동생이 지은 모형 말고

translation.en: It's not a replica! I bought the actual library building and had it moved here.
translation.ko: 모형 아니야, 실제 건물을 여기로 옮겨 왔어

translation.en: Well, most of it...
the crane dropped one of the walls,
so we had to replace it with plywood and spackle.
Spackle. That's a funny word.
Dad, I can't handle living in this monument
to Richie's pathetically lucky success.
You should be happy for your brother.
Not only did he make a gajillion dollars,
but that doodad he invented did something... good for the planet.
translation.ko: 쟤가 발명한 게 뭔지 몰라도 지구에 좋대

translation.en: Eliminated the need for carbon-based fuel.
Yeah, that.
All Richie did was catch lightning in a bottle!
translation.ko: 리치가 한 일은 번개를 병에 담은 거죠

translation.en: Literally! He just crammed a bunch of uneaten vegetables
translation.ko: 말 그대로요, 안 먹은 채소를 병에 담았는데

translation.en: into a bottle that happened to get struck by lightning.
translation.ko: 말 그대로요, 안 먹은 채소를 병에 담았는데 그게 번개에 맞았어요

translation.en: Are you accusing me of not knowing what I was doing
when I invented my trap-electricity-in-vegetables thingamajig?
translation.ko: 전기를 채소에 담는 장치를 발명했을 때?

translation.en: Dad. Why did you want to see us?
See you? I don't know.
Oh, wait, yeah, uh...
so I wanted to spend some quality time together.
I feel really disconnected here. What if we had a family dinner?
translation.ko: 너무 단절된 느낌이야 같이 저녁 먹을까?

translation.en: A family dinner? Why am I being punished?
translation.ko: 같이 저녁을요? 내가 왜 벌을 받죠?

translation.en: Guess what?
I hacked into your bank account and had you buy you a vertical wind tunnel.
translation.ko: 네 계좌 해킹해서 수직 풍동 샀어

translation.en: BTW, your password was really weak, so I went ahead and changed it for you.
Okay, what's the new one?
For security reasons, I can't tell you.
Richie, we have a problem. It's your new jet.
translation.ko: 리치, 문제가 생겼어 네 새 제트기야

translation.en: Don't tell me there are more engine issues.
translation.ko: 엔진 문제가 또 있다곤 하지 마

translation.en: Apparently, a solid gold jet has trouble staying in the air.
#trillionaireproblems.
Jet or no jet, we can still skydive with this.
translation.ko: 제트기 없어도 이걸로 스카이다이빙 할 수 있어

translation.en: Oh, no! Darcy crashed through the ceiling!
It's worse than you think. Right above my room is a gorilla habitat.
translation.ko: 그보다 더 심각한 상황이야 내 방 위가 고릴라 서식지거든

translation.en: Of all the days to wear banana lip gloss.
You're in good hands, Darcy.
I downloaded an entire medical library on Irona's hard drive.
translation.ko: 아이로나의 하드 드라이브에 모든 의학 지식을 다운받았어

translation.en: Now, she's practically a doctor.
Before I do any more, I will need proof of insurance.
Darcy, I feel bad that you blasted through the ceiling into my gorilla habitat...
translation.ko: 다르시, 천장 뚫고 고릴라 서식지에 가다니 안됐다

translation.en: and that my ceiling fan was on high.
I want to do something to make this up to you.
I have just the thing! A coupon for a free lemonade at Corndog Larry's.
How about I score us three passes to a concert of a lifetime?
translation.ko: 그거 말고 최고의 콘서트 표는 어때?

translation.en: Like the one and only U.S. show of Swedish house sensation
translation.ko: 스웨덴 하우스 센세이션의 유일한 미국 공연

translation.en: Swedish House Sensation!
That's awesome!
He's the best deejay in the world!
It hurts to get excited.
Maybe you didn't hear me. Coupon. Free lemonade.
translation.ko: 내 말 못 들었어? 쿠폰, 공짜 레모네이드

translation.en: Free.
Murray told me you bought the concert tickets
and exactly how much they cost.
I can't wait for tomorrow night! Me neither!
Now I just have to find something to wear...
Irona, to the mall.
Richie.
I feel like you, Harp, and I are drifting apart,
so I'm reinstituting an old family tradition.
translation.ko: 그래서 가족 전통을 다시 시작하기로 했어

translation.en: Dad, Harp and I are too old to take baths together.
translation.ko: 아빠, 난 누나랑 같이 목욕하기엔 너무 컸어요

translation.en: Starting tomorrow, I'm bringing back family game night.
translation.ko: 내일 저녁부터 가족 게임을 할 거야

translation.en: Tomorrow? I can't! I have plans!
Richie, when we moved here, we agreed.
translation.ko: 리치, 여기 이사 올 때 약속했잖아

translation.en: Your house, my rules.
translation.ko: 네 집이지만 내 규칙 따른다고, 취소해

translation.en: Please!
I'd be willing to revisit the bath thing.
Of all the nights to have a stupid family game night,
my dad picks the one night I have concert tickets.
Spending quality time with family
is important for maintaining meaningful relationships.
translation.ko: 가족과 시간 보내는 건 중요하죠 의미 있는 관계를 유지하려면요

translation.en: You may have a motherboard, but you don't have to act like my mother.
translation.ko: '마더보드' 있는 건 알지만 엄마처럼 굴지 마

translation.en: Apologies, Master Richie. Pops be straight trippin', yo.
translation.ko: 사과하죠, 리치 님 아빠 대박 심하네, 요

translation.en: Hey, Richie.
Guess who just beat Murray in a game of HORSE--
the girl who can't use her extremities!
Well, I have some bad news about Swedish House Sensation.
translation.ko: 스웨덴 하우스 센세이션에 대한 안 좋은 소식이 있어

translation.en: Oh, no. Don't tell me he's not going to perform 'Bout Them Meatballs!
I love that song. The beat makes me move my feet like a wild man.
translation.ko: 그 노래 좋아, 들으면 발이 미친 듯이 움직여

translation.en: The problem is, we can't go to the concert.
What?
Why? Do you have plans with some new fancy rich friends?
translation.ko: - 뭐? - 왜? 새 부자 친구들과 다른 약속 있어?

translation.en: By the way, if they need a money manager, here's my card.
translation.ko: 걔들도 재정 관리인 필요하면 내 명함 줘

translation.en: I knew once you became rich you wouldn't want to hang out with us anymore.
translation.ko: 네가 부자 되면 우리랑 안 놀 줄 알았어

translation.en: Those gorillas may have broken 84 of my bones,
but you broke my heart.
You didn't let me finish.
I was saying we can't go to the concert...
because it's gonna be here. In my room.
It is?
That's the plan.
That I just came up with.
Master Richie, may I have a word?
I do not understand. Are you canceling family game night?
translation.ko: 이해가 안 가요 가족 게임 취소예요?

translation.en: Nope. I'm going to both.
I do not think that is a wise--
[ahem] Get yours, son. Word.
Hello! I am Swedish house sensation
translation.ko: 안녕하세요 스웨덴 하우스 센세이션인 스웨덴 하우스 센세이션입니다

translation.en: Swedish House Sensation!
translation.ko: 스웨덴 하우스 센세이션인 스웨덴 하우스 센세이션입니다

translation.en: Whoa! Hello, you fine piece of reinforced titanium alloy.
translation.ko: 안녕, 멋진 강화 티타늄 합금 씨

translation.en: You are sure easy on the multispectral optical sensors.
You are "bootiful" yourself,
translation.ko: 그쪽도 아름답지만 이 말은 꼭 해야겠군요

translation.en: but I must say, there is a Mrs. House Sensation.
translation.ko: 그쪽도 아름답지만 이 말은 꼭 해야겠군요 하우스 센세이션 부인이 있어요

translation.en: So what is having Richie Rich bring me here?
He was hoping to convince you to move tomorrow's show here.
Are you suggesting...
Oh, it... it's so hot in zis helmet.
You are human?
I am sorry, but moving my concert here is not possible.
translation.ko: 미안하지만 콘서트를 여기로 옮길 순 없어요

translation.en: Maybe this will change your mind.
I will be here at 7:00.
But I cannot stay for after-party.
If I'm not home in time for family game night,
my papa will give me a swift kick in ze rumpa!
Murray, where's Darcy? I want to say hi before game night.
translation.ko: 머리, 다르시는? 게임 시작 전에 인사하려고

translation.en: Game night? You mean the concert?
Guys! How do I look?
Oh... my... gauze.
I ordered a custom couture body cast so I wouldn't look like an idiot.
translation.ko: 바보처럼 안 보이게 고급 깁스를 주문했어

translation.en: Hope you kept the receipt.
Master Richie.
1 minute and 53 seconds until family game night.
And about 5 minutes until I put the moves on that amplifier.
Got to get out here...
You know, Murray. It occurs to me.
This concert's gonna add a lot to my electricity bill.
translation.ko: 이 콘서트 때문에 전기세 많이 나올 거야

translation.en: You're right. How did I miss that?
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞아 그걸 왜 놓쳤지?

translation.en: Permission to dock my pay? Don't worry about it.
translation.ko: - 내 월급 깎아도 돼? - 걱정 마

translation.en: I have an idea to recoup some cash! Souvenir sales!
translation.ko: 돈을 벌 생각이 있어 기념품 팔자

translation.en: How about you start all the way across the room,
then make your way to the other side of the room, avoiding this general vicinity?
translation.ko: 다른 쪽으로 가 이 근처만 좀 피하고

translation.en: Souvenirs! Get your bobbleheads here!
- [mic feedback] - Hello, Richie Rich's bedroom!
Thanks again, Richie. Even though I can't see you,
translation.ko: 고마워, 리치 목을 못 돌려서 널 볼 순 없지만

translation.en: because I can't turn my neck.
translation.ko: 목을 못 돌려서 널 볼 순 없지만

translation.en: It means a lot having you right by my side.
Yep. Right by your side.
That's where I'll be, all night.
Richie? Are you still there?
[Richie's voice] Of course. I'm right here, Darcy.
Do you think that amplifier likes long walks on the beach?
Game night! Time for some family bonding!
You're lucky I'm in a rush to get this over with.
translation.ko: 내가 빨리 끝내고 싶어 하는 걸 감사해라

translation.en: Otherwise I would take the time to strangle you.
translation.ko: 안 그랬으면 네 목을 졸랐을 거야

translation.en: Okay, Harper's in the spirit.
This is all your fault. I could be out doing something fun with my Friday night,
translation.ko: 다 네 탓이야, 금요일엔 재밌는 거 할 수도 있었는데

translation.en: like studying, if you hadn't become Mr. Rich and Famous.
translation.ko: 공부 같은 거! 너만 부자 안 됐으면 가능했지

translation.en: Okay, for the record, I've been Mr. Rich since I was born.
Until last week, the name was just tragically ironic.
Okay, time to play Duck, Duck, Hippopotamus!
You mean "goose"? I mean hippopotamus.
I couldn't find a goose costume.
- [both] Costume? - Mm-hmm.
I thought the game would be more fun if we all got into parts.
translation.ko: 역할에 몰입하면 더 재미있을 거 같았어

translation.en: Maybe I will take the time to strangle you.
- [muffled music] - What's that booming noise? Sounds like bass from a concert.
translation.ko: 무슨 소리지? 콘서트 베이스 소리 같네

translation.en: Concert? Ha... who has a concert in their house?
That's... construction workers I hired to hammer out the spackle.
[chuckles] Spackle.
So you guys ready to play?
Not really.
I'm not feeling too well. I need a bathroom.
For everyone's sake, I'm gonna use the one in the south wing.
Got your text. What's the emergency? Your friend Darcy's very boring.
translation.ko: - 문자 봤어, 비상사태라고? - 다르시는 무지 지루해요

translation.en: What?
You called me up here for that?
Well, that and Swedish House Sensation keeps asking for you.
translation.ko: 스웨덴 하우스 센세이션이 자꾸 주인님을 불러요 리치 리치가 여기 있나요? 집주인이니 있어야죠

translation.en: Is Richie Rich in ze house? I would hope so, since it is his house.
translation.ko: 리치 리치가 여기 있나요? 집주인이니 있어야죠

translation.en: Of course he's here!
He's right by my side.
translation.ko: 당연히 있죠 제 옆에 있잖아요 그래, 계속 있었지

translation.en: Yep, been here all night.
Richie! Get up here and shake your rumpa!
This night's been a pain in my rumpa.
Incoming message from your sister:
[in Harper's voice] "Richie, get back here!"
Okay, remember what I said about my dad's voice
It's even more disturbing when you use my sister's.
[all] Richie! Richie! Richie!
Murray! I need you to dance for me!
Put on my jacket and this mask and make me look cool.
translation.ko: 내 재킷 입고 마스크 써 멋지게 보여야 해

translation.en: I can do two of those things.
[all] Richie! Richie!
Richie! Richie! I'm back!
Richie, you're sweating. You must really be sick.
translation.ko: 리치, 땀 흘리네 정말 아픈가 보다

translation.en: We should cancel family game night until he's all better.
And here's to hoping he doesn't
have one of those chronic gastrointestinal disorders that last a lifetime.
Maybe I should take you to your room and put you to bed.
No! I mean...
translation.ko: 안 돼요! 최신 시스템 때문에 방에 못 들어가잖아요

translation.en: you wouldn't be able to get in because of that high-tech entry system.
translation.ko: 최신 시스템 때문에 방에 못 들어가잖아요

translation.en: And the eye scanner device.
Yeah, those are tricky.
All right, game on!
- [elevator bell dings] - Duck... duck...
Hello! Richie?
My sister Gerta has same hippopotamus costume.
translation.ko: 내 동생 게르타도 하마 의상 있는데

translation.en: - Who is that? - Yeah, who is that?
Gerta's brother?
What are you doing here? You're supposed to be on stage.
I take bathroom break and toilet chase me here.
Richie, what's going on here? Who's the Swedish guy?
translation.ko: 리치, 무슨 일이냐? 스웨덴 남자는 누구야?

translation.en: Sven. Best meatball chef in the biz.
He adds a pinch of paprika that really gives a bang to the ball.
translation.ko: 파프리카를 넣어서 톡 쏘는 맛을 줘요

translation.en: Richie, I'm disappointed in you.
Dad, I can explain-- No, there's no excuse for this.
translation.ko: - 아빠, 설명할게요 - 아니, 변명 필요 없어

translation.en: Everyone knows the best meatballs are Italian.
You're right!
Sven, we better get you and your paprika out of here.
Richie! Who is paprika?
What is paprika?
How's the music playing if you're not even up there?
I am deejay. I just hit button and pretend to do stuff.
translation.ko: 난 디제이야, 버튼 누르고 뭔가 하는 척만 해

translation.en: Well, get up there and pretend to do stuff!
Murray?
Irona, where's Richie?
[gasps] Sleep mode.
I'm here!
Why are you dressed like Gerta House Sensation?
Good question. I'll go change.
Murray, there's something going on with Richie.
We need to find him.
translation.ko: 머리, 리치가 이상해 찾아봐야겠어 돌리 좀 들어

translation.en: Grab the dolly!
Are you okay to push me?
I-I think so...
But I do need to make another appointment with my chiropractor.
translation.ko: 하지만 척추 지압사 또 예약해야 해

translation.en: And my attorney.
No! I can't be on empty!
Hello, Hallwayside Assistance?
Duck... duck... Duck...
Hippopotamus!
Why aren't you chasing me?
- Self-pride. - [elevator bell dings]
What are you two doing here?
Looking for Richie. Hey, so are we!
Ooh, hide and seek. I'm gonna go hide in my room for the next ten years.
translation.ko: 술래잡기 해요, 난 10년간 내 방에 숨을게요

translation.en: Hey, I'm back!
Richie, where have you been? Yeah, where have you been?
translation.ko: - 리치, 어디 갔었어? - 그래, 어디 갔었어?

translation.en: Uh... sleep mode.
Dad, Richie was obviously lying and sneaking off to hang with his friends.
translation.ko: 아빠, 리치가 거짓말하고 친구들 만나러 갔었어요

translation.en: He needs to punished.
And if you need ideas, I have a list.
Richie, why'd you ditch me at the concert?
Concert? What concert?
Okay, here's the truth:
I promised I would take you guys to Swedish House Sensation,
but then my dad insisted on family game night.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠가 가족 게임 꼭 해야 한다잖아

translation.en: I didn't want to let you guys down so I moved the concert here
translation.ko: 너희를 실망시키고 싶지 않아서 콘서트를 여기로 옮겨 둘 다 하려 한 거야

translation.en: and tried to be in two places at once.
translation.ko: 콘서트를 여기로 옮겨 둘 다 하려 한 거야

translation.en: Richard Rich.
Are you telling me that there are hundreds of strangers at a concert in this house?
translation.ko: 이 집에 콘서트 보러 낯선 사람이 수백 명 왔다고?

translation.en: Do you know how much fun Duck, Duck, Hippopotamus would be with that many people?
translation.ko: 오리, 오리, 하마 같이 하면 얼마나 재미있겠어?

translation.en: Dad! What about Richie's punishment?
How 'bout number 37? It's no food or water.
I'm sorry I wasn't honest with you guys.
I know you were worried that we wouldn't be friends
translation.ko: 내가 부자 돼서 친구 안 할까 봐 걱정했잖아

translation.en: - now that I'm rich and I didn't-- - Yeah, yeah.
translation.ko: 내가 부자 돼서 친구 안 할까 봐 걱정했잖아 그래, 콘서트 후에 얘기하면 안 돼?

translation.en: Can we talk about this after the concert?
translation.ko: 그래, 콘서트 후에 얘기하면 안 돼?

translation.en: I really don't want to miss 'Bout Them Meatballs.
I hate to give you credit, Richie... [shrilly] But this is awesome!
- Shh! - I'm allowed to talk at a concert!
Tchotchkes! Get your tchotchkes here!
Check it! I'm breaking out the robot!
translation.ko: 이거 봐 나 로봇 춤 춘다

translation.en: Oh, sure. Because all robots move like that. I am out of here.
translation.ko: 로봇이 다 그렇게 춰요? 난 가겠어요

translation.en: Duck... duck... duck... Duck... Duck... duck...
Yeah, this turned out great.
Nothing's better than having fun with the people I care about.
translation.ko: 내가 아끼는 사람들과 즐겁게 노는 게 최고지

translation.en: Wait... where's Darcy?
Guys?
You forgot someone!
Can anyone hear me?
Richie? Is that you?
